casebody.data:
Martin T. SLAUGHTER
v.
Nicole B. SLAUGHTER No. 324P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 14, 2017 Ralph S. Pennington, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, J. Albert Clyburn, Attorney at Law, for Slaughter, Martin T. John M. Martin, Attorney at Law, Winterville, Alexander C. Dale, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Slaughter, Nicole B.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 9th of October 2017 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of November 2017."
